overview: Modern life can be so sedentary – but not for these fucking lads! For when they’re not in the gym keeping their handsome, toned bodies at the peak of physical fitness, they’re enjoying the hottest, wildest sex imaginable – with the same cardiovascular results! As such, weights and treadmills are always optional for gym-rats like Kellan James and Noah Matous; with new boys, Ben Rasgar and Victor Rozas, joining Johnathan Strake and Seb Priestley for a jizzy, pumped-up session of cock-sucking and raw ass-banging at its very, very best!
title: Bareback Gym Buddies 2
